thread.section_title: Hilton Garden Inn New York/Central Park South-Midtown West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best hotel so far!
thread.title_full: Best hotel so far! - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York/Central Park South-Midtown West, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Lisa D
title: Best hotel so far!
text: I've been to NYC several times and each time I have disappointed by the hotel rooms I stay in. We decided to go with a "chain" and we were highly impressed. The staff was extremely friendly and our room was comfy and cozy! We were in a perfect area to walk to Central Park, Times Square and the theater. We will definitely be staying here again during our next NYC trip!
